head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Wyandanch: Man Accused Of 8 Burglaries

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Wyandanch: Man Accused Of 8 Burglaries

abstract.p: Wayne Toney is arrested in connection with eight burglaries in Suffolk County, NY (S)

block.p: A man has been arrested in connection with eight burglaries in Suffolk County over the past three months, the police said yesterday. The man, Wayne Toney, 23, of Wyandanch, was arrested on Monday shortly after a robbery in which someone kicked in a house door and stole jewelry, the Suffolk County police said. After a further investigation, the police said, Mr. Toney was also arrested in connection with robberies in which copper pipes were stolen from houses' heating systems. He was charged yesterday with eight counts of second-degree burglary in Suffolk County District Court, the police said.
